name: Web Development
description: Topics on frontend and backend web technologies.

name: Machine Learning
description: Covers supervised, unsupervised learning, and deep learning.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Discusses ethical hacking, cryptography, and network security.

name: Cloud Computing
description: Focuses on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud services.

name: Mobile Development
description: Covers Android, iOS, and cross-platform app development.

name: Data Science
description: Includes data visualization, analysis, and statistical methods.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Covers AI concepts, neural networks, and applications.

name: Game Development
description: Focuses on Unity, Unreal Engine, and game mechanics.

name: Embedded Systems
description: Discusses microcontrollers, IoT, and real-time systems.

name: Networking
description: Covers network protocols, TCP/IP, and system administration.

name: Operating Systems
description: Topics include Windows, Linux, and macOS internals.

name: Blockchain
description: Discusses cryptocurrencies, smart contracts, and DApps.

name: Software Testing
description: Covers manual, automated, and performance testing.

name: UI/UX Design
description: Focuses on user experience and interface design principles.

name: Big Data
description: Covers Hadoop, Spark, and large-scale data processing.

name: Computer Vision
description: Discusses image processing and deep learning applications.

name: Natural Language Processing
description: Covers text analysis and AI-driven language models.

name: DevOps
description: Includes CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and automation.

name: Quantum Computing
description: Discusses quantum mechanics and computation theories.

name: Augmented Reality
description: Covers AR applications and development tools.

name: Virtual Reality
description: Discusses VR applications and simulation technologies.

name: Data Structures
description: Topics on trees, graphs, and algorithm optimizations.

name: Algorithms
description: Covers sorting, searching, and problem-solving techniques.

name: Computer Graphics
description: Discusses rendering, modeling, and animation techniques.

name: Edge Computing
description: Focuses on real-time processing at the edge devices.

name: Internet of Things
description: Discusses smart devices and IoT ecosystems.

name: Database Administration
description: Topics on database design, indexing, and optimization.

name: Functional Programming
description: Covers Lisp, Haskell, and declarative programming.

name: Microservices Architecture
description: Focuses on distributed systems and API design.

name: Computer Architecture
description: Discusses processors, memory management, and hardware.

name: Parallel Computing
description: Covers multi-threading and distributed computing.

name: Software Engineering
description: Topics include SDLC, Agile, and design patterns.

name: Ethical Hacking
description: Discusses penetration testing and security vulnerabilities.

name: Digital Forensics
description: Covers cybercrime investigation and forensic techniques.

name: Human-Computer Interaction
description: Focuses on UI/UX research and interaction design.

name: Embedded AI
description: Discusses AI applications in embedded systems.

name: Geospatial Analytics
description: Covers GIS, satellite imagery, and spatial data analysis.

name: Digital Signal Processing
description: Topics on audio, image, and sensor data processing.

name: Software Development Methodologies
description: Covers Agile, Scrum, and Lean methodologies.

name: Compiler Design
description: Discusses lexical analysis, parsing, and code generation.

name: Mathematical Computing
description: Focuses on numerical analysis and symbolic computation.

name: Bioinformatics
description: Covers computational biology and genomics.

name: Distributed Systems
description: Focuses on P2P networks, fault tolerance, and scalability.

name: Social Network Analysis
description: Discusses network graphs, influencers, and analytics.

name: Data Governance
description: Topics on data privacy, compliance, and management.

name: Robotics
description: Covers robotic process automation and control systems.

name: Edge AI
description: Discusses AI inference on edge devices.

name: Automated Reasoning
description: Focuses on logic programming and theorem proving.
